stdin: /usr/local/bin/prepareOutput.r inputcamera=$(echo $CAMERA_IN) inputscores=$(echo $SCORES_IN) inputpheno=/pfs/params/sampleInfo.csv ppm=10 rt=10 higherTheBetter=false scoreColumn=q.value impute=true typeColumn=type selectedType=sample rename=true renameCol=rename onlyReportWithID=false combineReplicate=true combineReplicateColumn=rep log=false sampleCoverage=50 sampleCoverageMethod=global outputPeakTable=/pfs/out/peaktable.txt outputVariables=/pfs/out/vars.txt outputMetaData=/pfs/out/metadata.txt
